course_description: This course will cover United States trademark and unfair competition law, exclusive of antitrust law. Participants will learn the prerequisites for trademark rights and for the registration of marks in the U.S. and Trademark Office. They also will learn the causes of action available to protect marks, as well as those for false advertising and related torts.
